headline: Trump Says Federal Intel Stake Has Made 'Tens Of Billions': Stock Climbs
summary: President Donald Trump boasted about Intel Corp. (NASDAQ:INTC) new processors and the U.S. government’s stake in the company late Thursday afternoon. Intel shares moved higher. In a social media post, Trump said he had just completed a “great meeting with the very successful Intel CEO, Lip-Bu Tan.” “Intel just launched the first SUB 2 NANOMETER CPU PROCESSOR designed, built, and packaged right here in the U.S.A.,” Trump said. headline: Top AI stock picks: Is it Nvidia or bust?
summary: Which stock is the best artificial intelligence (AI) play for investors: Nvidia (NVDA), Intel (INTC), or AMD (AMD)? D.A. Davidson head of technology research Gil Luria, Wedbush Securities managing director and global head of technology research Dan Ives, and Yahoo Finance Senior Reporter Ines Ferré join Opening Bid host Brian Sozzi to share their takes on the names. To watch more expert insights and analysis on the latest market action, check out more Opening Bid.

content.title: Top AI stock picks: Is it Nvidia or bust?
content.description:
Which stock is the best artificial intelligence (AI) play for investors: Nvidia (NVDA), Intel (INTC), or AMD (AMD)?

D.A. Davidson head of technology research Gil Luria, Wedbush Securities managing director and global head of technology research Dan Ives, and Yahoo Finance Senior Reporter Ines Ferré join Opening Bid host Brian Sozzi to share their takes on the names.

To watch more expert insights and analysis on the latest market action, check out more Opening Bid.
